categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A Human male gunner served inside the control room of the second Death Star during the Battle of Endor. Moff Tiaan Jerjerrod, the battlestation's commander, instructed this gunner to fire on the Liberty, upon being given the order to attack by Emperor Palpatine. Jerjerrod later ordered the gunner to use the Death Star II's superlaser to destroy the Forest Moon of Endor near the climax of the battle, an order never carried out before the Death Star was destroyed.
The gunner wore a similar uniform to that of the Imperial Navy troopers.
This uncredited role was likely played by stunt performer and Mark Hamill stunt double Colin Skeaping.[source?]
